San Juan Bautista Valle Nacional

Offering a swimming pool, an extensive garden with camping area and free Wi-Fi throughout, Cabaña San Mateo Yetla is located 1.5 km from San Juan Bautista Valle Nacional Town Centre... view morefrom

$US 35Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Amatlán

San Miguel Amatlán

Offering a restaurant and free daily breakfast, Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Amatlán is located in San Miguel Amatlán, 1 hours’ drive from Oaxaca de Juárez. The rustic-style cottages are built with adobe bricks and have fireplaces... view morefrom

$US 56Cabaña Santa Cruz Tepetotutla

San Felipe Usila

Offering all meals for free, one free hiking tour and a camping area, Cabaña Santa Cruz Tepetotutla is located inside Chichintla Nature Reserve and 2.5 km from San Felipe Usila Town Centre... view morefrom

$US 55Cabaña San Antonio del Barrio

San Felipe Usila

Located within the Chinantla Natural Reserve, Cabaña San Antonio del Barrio is a rustic-style bungalow with a kitchenette. It is set in a complex with camping areas and an on-site restaurant... view morefrom

$US 55Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Latuvi

Santa Catarina Lachatao

Offering free breakfast, an extensive garden and free Access to Ecopark, Centro Ecoturístico Cabañas Latuvi is located 100 metres from Latuvi village and 1 km from Benito Juárez Village... view morefrom
